Fist Gummidge was a member of the Flaming Fist mercenary company from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Gummidge had a fair complexion with light brown hair and beard. He wore a set of leather armor as part of the Flaming Fist uniform and was armed with a deadly heavy crossbow.
In the , Fist Gummidge was tasked with patrolling the Lower City, near the Basilisk Gate. He and his fellow patrolmen had no qualms with shutting protesters up with force.
